00051 QoccViewWidget::QoccViewWidget( const Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& aContext, 
00052                                                                 QWidget *parent, 
00053                                                                 Qt::WindowFlags f )
00054 : QWidget( parent, f | Qt::MSWindowsOwnDC ),
00055         myView            ( NULL ),
00056         myRubberBand      ( NULL ),
00057         myMode                    ( CurAction3d_Undefined ),
00058         myGridSnap        ( Standard_False ),
00059         myViewResized     ( Standard_False ),
00060         myViewInitialized ( Standard_False ),
00061         myPrecision               ( 0.001 ),
00062         myViewPrecision   ( 0.0 ),
00063         myDetection               ( AIS_SOD_Nothing ),
00064         myKeyboardFlags   ( Qt::NoModifier ),
00065         myButtonFlags     ( Qt::NoButton )
00066 {
00067         myContext = aContext;
00068         // Needed to generate mouse events
00069         setMouseTracking( true );
00070 
00071         // Avoid Qt background clears to improve resizing speed,
00072         // along with a couple of other attributes
00073         setAutoFillBackground( false );                         
00074         setAttribute( Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground );      
00075 
00076         // This next attribute seems to be the secret of allowing OCC on Win32
00077         // to "own" the window, even though its only supposed to work on X11.
00078         setAttribute( Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen );
00079 
00080         // Here's a modified pick point cursor from AutoQ3D
00081         QBitmap curb1( 48, 48 );
00082         QBitmap curb2( 48, 48 );
00083         curb1.fill( QColor( 255, 255, 255 ) );
00084         curb2.fill( QColor( 255, 255, 255 ) );
00085         QPainter p;
00086 
00087         p.begin( &curb1 );
00088                 p.drawLine( 24,  0, 24, 47 );
00089                 p.drawLine(  0, 24, 47, 24 );
00090                 p.setBrush( Qt::NoBrush );
00091                 p.drawRect( 18, 18, 12, 12 );
00092         p.end();
00093         myCrossCursor = QCursor( curb2, curb1, 24, 24 );
00094 
00095         // Create a rubber band box for later mouse activity
00096         myRubberBand = new QRubberBand( QRubberBand::Rectangle, this );
00097         if (myRubberBand)
00098         {
00099                 // If you don't set a style, QRubberBand doesn't work properly
00100                 // take this line out if you don't believe me.
00101                 myRubberBand->setStyle( (QStyle*) new QPlastiqueStyle() );
00102         }
00103         connect(this, SIGNAL(selectionChanged()),this,SLOT(slotSelectionChange()));
00104 }
00105 
00111 QoccViewWidget::~QoccViewWidget()
00112 {
00113         if ( myRubberBand )
00114         {
00115                 delete myRubberBand;
00116         }
00117 }

00127 void QoccViewWidget::initializeOCC(const Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& aContext)
00128 {
00129         Aspect_RenderingContext rc = 0;
00130         myContext = aContext;
00131         myViewer  = myContext->CurrentViewer();
00132         myView    = myViewer->CreateView();
00133         
00134         int windowHandle = (int) winId();
00135     short lo = (short)   windowHandle;
00136     short hi = (short) ( windowHandle >> 16 );
00137 
00138 #ifdef WNT
00139         // rc = (Aspect_RenderingContext) wglGetCurrentContext();
00140     myWindow = new WNT_Window( Handle(Graphic3d_WNTGraphicDevice)
00141                                                            ::DownCast( myContext->CurrentViewer()->Device() ) ,
00142                                                            (int) hi, (int) lo );
00143         // Turn off background erasing in OCC's window
00144         myWindow->SetFlags( WDF_NOERASEBKGRND );
00145 #else
00146         // rc = (Aspect_RenderingContext) glXGetCurrentContext(); // Untested!
00147     myWindow = new Xw_Window( Handle(Graphic3d_GraphicDevice)
00148                                                                         ::DownCast( myContext->CurrentViewer()->Device() ),
00149                                                           (int) hi, (int) lo, Xw_WQ_SAMEQUALITY, Quantity_NOC_BLACK );
00150 #endif // WNT
00151         
00152         if (!myView.IsNull())
00153         {
00154                 // Set my window (Hwnd) into the OCC view
00155             myView->SetWindow( myWindow, rc , paintCallBack, this  );
00156                 // Set up axes (Trihedron) in lower left corner.
00157                 myView->SetScale( 2 );                  // Choose a "nicer" intial scale
00158 
00159                 // Set up axes (Trihedron) in lower left corner.
00160 #ifdef OCC_PATCHED
00161                 myView->TriedronDisplay( Aspect_TOTP_LEFT_LOWER, Quantity_NOC_WHITE, 0.1, V3d_ZBUFFER );
00162 #else
00163                 myView->TriedronDisplay( Aspect_TOTP_LEFT_LOWER, Quantity_NOC_WHITE, 0.1, V3d_WIREFRAME );
00164 #endif
00165                 // For testing OCC patches
00166                 // myView->ColorScaleDisplay(); 
00167                 // Map the window
00168                 if (!myWindow->IsMapped())
00169                 {
00170                         myWindow->Map();
00171                 }
00172                 // Force a redraw to the new window on next paint event
00173                 myViewResized = Standard_True;
00174                 // Set default cursor as a cross
00175                 setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00176                 // This is to signal any connected slots that the view is ready.
00177                 myViewInitialized = Standard_True;
00178                 emit initialized();
00179         }
00180 }

00186 QPaintEngine* QoccViewWidget::paintEngine() const
00187 {
00188         return NULL;

00190 
00196 void QoccViewWidget::paintEvent ( QPaintEvent * /* e */)
00197 {
00198         if ( !myViewInitialized )
00199         {
00200                 if ( winId() )
00201                 {
00202                         initializeOCC( myContext );
00203                 }
00204         }
00205         if ( !myViewer.IsNull() )
00206         {
00207                 redraw( true ); 
00208         }
00209 }

00219 {
00220         myViewResized = Standard_True;
00221 }       
00222 
00227 void QoccViewWidget::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* e )
00228 {
00229         myButtonFlags = e->button();
00230 
00231         // Cache the keyboard flags for the whole gesture
00232         myKeyboardFlags = e->modifiers();
00233 
00234         // The button mappings can be used as a mask. This code prevents conflicts
00235         // when more than one button pressed simutaneously.
00236         if ( e->button() & Qt::LeftButton )
00237         {
00238                 onLeftButtonDown  ( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00239         }
00240         else if ( e->button() & Qt::RightButton )
00241         {
00242                 onRightButtonDown ( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00243         }
00244         else if ( e->button() & Qt::MidButton )
00245         {
00246                 onMiddleButtonDown( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00247         }
00248 }
00249 
00254 void QoccViewWidget::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* e)
00255 {
00256         myButtonFlags = Qt::NoButton;
00257         redraw();                                                       // Clears up screen when menu selected but not used.
00258         hideRubberBand();
00259         if ( e->button() & Qt::LeftButton )
00260         {
00261                 onLeftButtonUp  ( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00262         }
00263         else if ( e->button() & Qt::RightButton )
00264         {
00265                 onRightButtonUp ( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00266         }
00267         else if ( e->button() & Qt::MidButton )
00268         {
00269                 onMiddleButtonUp( myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00270         }
00271 }
00272 
00277 void QoccViewWidget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* e)
00278 {
00279         Standard_Real X, Y, Z;
00280         
00281         myCurrentPoint = e->pos();
00282         //Check if the grid is active and that we're snapping to it
00283         if( myContext->CurrentViewer()->Grid()->IsActive() && myGridSnap )
00284         {
00285                 myView->ConvertToGrid( myCurrentPoint.x(),
00286                                                            myCurrentPoint.y(),
00287                                                            myV3dX,
00288                                                            myV3dY,
00289                                                            myV3dZ );
00290                 emit mouseMoved( myV3dX, myV3dY, myV3dZ );
00291         }
00292         else // this is the standard case
00293         {
00294                 if (convertToPlane( myCurrentPoint.x(),
00295                                                         myCurrentPoint.y(),
00296                                                         X, Y, Z ) )
00297                 {
00298                         myV3dX = precision( X );
00299                         myV3dY = precision( Y );
00300                         myV3dZ = precision( Z );
00301                         emit mouseMoved( myV3dX, myV3dY, myV3dZ );
00302                 }
00303                 else
00304                 {
00305                         emit sendStatus ( tr("Indeterminate Point") );
00306                 }
00307         }
00308 
00309         onMouseMove( e->buttons(), myKeyboardFlags, e->pos() );
00310 }
00311 
00319 void QoccViewWidget::leaveEvent ( QEvent* /* e */ )
00320 {
00321         myButtonFlags = Qt::NoButton;
00322 }
00323 
00328 void QoccViewWidget::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* e) {
00329     if (!myView.IsNull()) {
00330         if (e->delta() > 0) {
00331             // zoom out, with no shift                                          
00332             Quantity_Factor wheelZoomOutFactor = .7; // config setting [.1,.9]  
00333             myView->Panning(0, 0, wheelZoomOutFactor);
00334         }
00335         else {
00336             // shift what is under the cursor towards the center of             
00337             // the screen and zoom in                                           
00338             Quantity_Length dx, dy;
00339             Quantity_Factor scale = myView->Scale();
00340             Quantity_Factor wheelShiftFactor = 20.; // config setting [1.,20.]  
00341             dx = 2. * myCurrentPoint.x() / width() - 1.;
00342             dy = 2. * myCurrentPoint.y() / height() - 1.;
00343             myView->Panning(wheelShiftFactor * -dx / scale,
00344                             wheelShiftFactor * dy / scale, 1.1);
00345         }
00346     }
00347     else
00348         e->ignore();
00349 }
00350 
00355 void QoccViewWidget::idle( )
00356 {
00357         setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00358 }
00363 void QoccViewWidget::redraw( bool isPainting )
00364 {
00365         if ( !myView.IsNull() )                                 // Defensive test.
00366         {
00367                 if ( myViewResized )
00368                 {
00369                         myView->MustBeResized();
00370                         viewPrecision( true );
00371                 }
00372                 else
00373                 {       
00374                         // Don't repaint if we are already redrawing
00375                         // elsewhere due to a keypress or mouse gesture
00376                         if ( !isPainting || ( isPainting && myButtonFlags == Qt::NoButton ) )   
00377                         {                                                                                               
00378                                 myView->Redraw();
00379                         }
00380                 }
00381         }
00382         myViewResized = Standard_False;
00383 }

00415         }

00459 void QoccViewWidget::globalPan()
00460 {
00461         if (!myView.IsNull())
00462         {
00463                 // save the current zoom value
00464                 myCurZoom = myView->Scale();
00465                 // Do a Global Zoom
00466                 myView->FitAll();
00467                 viewPrecision( true );
00468                 // Set the mode
00469                 setMode( CurAction3d_GlobalPanning );
00470         }
00471 }

00605 void QoccViewWidget::background()
00606 {
00607     QColor aColor ;
00608     Standard_Real R1;
00609     Standard_Real G1;
00610     Standard_Real B1;
00611     myView->BackgroundColor(Quantity_TOC_RGB,R1,G1,B1);
00612     aColor.setRgb(( int )R1*255, ( int )G1*255, ( int )B1*255);
00613 
00614     QColor aRetColor = QColorDialog::getColor(aColor);
00615 
00616     if( aRetColor.isValid() )
00617         {
00618         R1 = aRetColor.red()/255.;
00619         G1 = aRetColor.green()/255.;
00620         B1 = aRetColor.blue()/255.;
00621         myView->SetBackgroundColor(Quantity_TOC_RGB,R1,G1,B1);
00622     }
00623     redraw();
00624 }

00626 void QoccViewWidget::setReset ()
00627 {
00628         if(!myView.IsNull())
00629         {
00630                 myView->SetViewOrientationDefault() ;
00631                 viewPrecision( true );
00632         }
00633 }
00634 
00638 void QoccViewWidget::onLeftButtonDown(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags, const QPoint point )
00639 {
00640     myStartPoint = point;
00641     if ( nFlags & CASCADESHORTCUTKEY )
00642     {
00643                 setMode( CurAction3d_DynamicZooming );
00644     }
00645     else
00646     {
00647         switch ( myMode )
00648         {
00649             case CurAction3d_Nothing:
00650                                 // emit pointClicked( myV3dX, myV3dY, myV3dZ );
00651                                 break;
00652 
00653                         case CurAction3d_Picking:
00654                                 break;
00655 
00656             case CurAction3d_DynamicZooming:
00657                                 break;
00658 
00659             case CurAction3d_WindowZooming:
00660                                 break;
00661 
00662             case CurAction3d_DynamicPanning:
00663                                 break;
00664 
00665             case CurAction3d_GlobalPanning:
00666                 break;
00667 
00668             case CurAction3d_DynamicRotation:
00669                 myView->StartRotation( myStartPoint.x(), myStartPoint.y() );
00670                 break;
00671 
00672             default:
00673                     Standard_Failure::Raise( "Incompatible Current Mode" );
00674                 break;
00675         }
00676     }
00677 }
00678 
00682 void QoccViewWidget::onMiddleButtonDown(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags, const QPoint point )
00683 {
00684         myStartPoint = point;
00685     if ( nFlags & CASCADESHORTCUTKEY )
00686         {
00687                 setMode( CurAction3d_DynamicPanning );
00688         }
00689 }
00690 
00694 void QoccViewWidget::onRightButtonDown(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags, const QPoint point )
00695 {
00696         myStartPoint = point;
00697     if ( nFlags & CASCADESHORTCUTKEY )
00698     {
00699                 setMode( CurAction3d_DynamicRotation );
00700                 myView->StartRotation( point.x(), point.y() );
00701     }
00702     else
00703     {
00704         emit popupMenu ( this, point );
00705     }
00706 }
00707 
00712 void QoccViewWidget::onLeftButtonUp(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags, const QPoint point )
00713 {
00714         myCurrentPoint = point;
00715         if ( nFlags & CASCADESHORTCUTKEY )
00716     {
00717                 // Deactivates dynamic zooming
00718                 setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00719         }
00720         else
00721         {
00722                 switch( myMode )
00723                 {
00724 
00725                         case CurAction3d_Nothing:
00726                                 break;
00727 
00728                         case CurAction3d_Picking:
00729                                 // Shouldn't get here yet
00730                                 if ( myCurrentPoint == myStartPoint )
00731                                 {
00732                                         inputEvent( nFlags & MULTISELECTIONKEY );
00733                                 }
00734                                 else
00735                                 {
00736                                         dragEvent( myStartPoint,
00737                                                        myCurrentPoint,
00738                                                            nFlags & MULTISELECTIONKEY );
00739                                 }
00740                                 break;
00741 
00742                         case CurAction3d_DynamicZooming:
00743                                 viewPrecision( true );
00744                                 break;
00745 
00746                         case CurAction3d_WindowZooming:
00747                                 if ( (abs( myCurrentPoint.x() - myStartPoint.x() ) > ValZWMin ) ||
00748                                          (abs( myCurrentPoint.y() - myStartPoint.y() ) > ValZWMin ) )
00749                                 {
00750                                         myView->WindowFitAll( myStartPoint.x(),
00751                                                                                   myStartPoint.y(),
00752                                                                                   myCurrentPoint.x(),
00753                                                                                   myCurrentPoint.y() );
00754                                 }
00755                                 viewPrecision( true );
00756                                 break;
00757 
00758                         case CurAction3d_DynamicPanning:
00759                                 break;
00760 
00761                         case CurAction3d_GlobalPanning :
00762                                 myView->Place( myCurrentPoint.x(), myCurrentPoint.y(), myCurZoom );
00763                                 break;
00764 
00765                         case CurAction3d_DynamicRotation:
00766                                 break;
00767 
00768                         default:
00769                                 Standard_Failure::Raise(" Incompatible Current Mode ");
00770                                 break;
00771                 }
00772         }
00773     emit selectionChanged();
00774 }
00779 void QoccViewWidget::onMiddleButtonUp(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers /* nFlags */, const QPoint /* point */ )
00780 {
00781     setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00782 }
00783 
00788 void QoccViewWidget::onRightButtonUp(  Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags, const QPoint point )
00789 {
00790         myCurrentPoint = point;
00791         if ( nFlags & CASCADESHORTCUTKEY )
00792     {
00793                 setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00794         }
00795         else
00796         {
00797                 if ( myMode == CurAction3d_Nothing )
00798                 {
00799                         emit popupMenu ( this, point );
00800                 }
00801                 else
00802                 {
00803                         setMode( CurAction3d_Nothing );
00804                 }
00805         }
00806 }
00807 
00815 void QoccViewWidget::onMouseMove( Qt::MouseButtons buttons,
00816                                                                    Qt::KeyboardModifiers nFlags,
00817                                                                    const QPoint point )
00818 {
00819         myCurrentPoint = point;
00820 
00821         if ( buttons & Qt::LeftButton  ||
00822                         buttons & Qt::RightButton ||
00823                                 buttons & Qt::MidButton )
00824         {
00825                 switch ( myMode )
00826                 {
00827                         case CurAction3d_Nothing:
00828                                 break;
00829 
00830                         case CurAction3d_Picking:
00831                                 // Shouldn't get here yet
00832                                 drawRubberBand ( myStartPoint, myCurrentPoint );
00833                                 dragEvent( myStartPoint, myCurrentPoint, nFlags & MULTISELECTIONKEY );
00834                                 break;
00835 
00836                         case CurAction3d_DynamicZooming:
00837                                 myView->Zoom(   myStartPoint.x(),
00838                                                                 myStartPoint.y(),
00839                                                                 myCurrentPoint.x(),
00840                                                                 myCurrentPoint.y() );
00841                                 viewPrecision( true );
00842                                 myStartPoint = myCurrentPoint;
00843                                 break;
00844 
00845                         case CurAction3d_WindowZooming:
00846                                 drawRubberBand ( myStartPoint, myCurrentPoint );
00847                                 break;
00848 
00849                         case CurAction3d_DynamicPanning:
00850                                 myView->Pan( myCurrentPoint.x() - myStartPoint.x(),
00851                                                      myStartPoint.y() - myCurrentPoint.y() );
00852                                 myStartPoint = myCurrentPoint;
00853                                 break;
00854 
00855                         case CurAction3d_GlobalPanning:
00856                                 break;
00857 
00858                         case CurAction3d_DynamicRotation:
00859                                 myView->Rotation( myCurrentPoint.x(), myCurrentPoint.y() );
00860                                 break;
00861 
00862                         default:
00863                                 Standard_Failure::Raise( "Incompatible Current Mode" );
00864                                 break;
00865                 }
00866         }
00867         else
00868         {
00869         moveEvent( myCurrentPoint );
00870     }
00871 }
00875 AIS_StatusOfDetection QoccViewWidget::moveEvent( QPoint point )
00876 {
00877         AIS_StatusOfDetection status;
00878         status = myContext->MoveTo( point.x(), point.y(), myView );
00879         return status;
00880 }
00881 
00889 AIS_StatusOfPick QoccViewWidget::dragEvent( const QPoint startPoint, const QPoint endPoint, const bool multi )
00890 {
00891         AIS_StatusOfPick pick = AIS_SOP_NothingSelected;
00892         if (multi)
00893         {
00894                 pick = myContext->ShiftSelect( std::min (startPoint.x(), endPoint.x()),
00895                                                                            std::min (startPoint.y(), endPoint.y()),
00896                                                                            std::max (startPoint.x(), endPoint.x()),
00897                                                                            std::max (startPoint.y(), endPoint.y()),
00898                                                                            myView );
00899         }
00900         else
00901         {
00902                 pick = myContext->Select( std::min (startPoint.x(), endPoint.x()),
00903                                                                   std::min (startPoint.y(), endPoint.y()),
00904                                                                   std::max (startPoint.x(), endPoint.x()),
00905                                                                   std::max (startPoint.y(), endPoint.y()),
00906                                                                   myView );
00907         }
00908     emit selectionChanged();
00909         return pick;
00910 }
00916 AIS_StatusOfPick QoccViewWidget::inputEvent( bool multi )
00917 {
00918         AIS_StatusOfPick pick = AIS_SOP_NothingSelected;
00919 
00920         if (multi)
00921         {
00922                 pick = myContext->ShiftSelect();
00923         }
00924         else
00925         {
00926             pick = myContext->Select();
00927         }
00928         if ( pick != AIS_SOP_NothingSelected )
00929         {
00930                 emit selectionChanged();
00931         }
00932         return pick;
00933 }
00934 
00935 bool QoccViewWidget::dump(Standard_CString theFile)
00936 {
00937   redraw();
00938   return myView->Dump(theFile);
00939 }
00940 
00945 void QoccViewWidget::setMode( const CurrentAction3d mode )
00946 {
00947         if ( mode != myMode )
00948         {
00949                 switch( mode )
00950                 {
00951                         case CurAction3d_DynamicPanning:
00952                                 setCursor( Qt::SizeAllCursor );
00953                                 break;
00954                         case CurAction3d_DynamicZooming:
00955                                 setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
00956                                 break;
00957                         case CurAction3d_DynamicRotation:
00958                                 setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
00959                                 break;
00960                         case CurAction3d_GlobalPanning:
00961                                 setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
00962                                 break;
00963                         case CurAction3d_WindowZooming:
00964                                 setCursor( Qt::PointingHandCursor );
00965                                 break;
00966                         case CurAction3d_Nothing:
00967                                 //setCursor( myCrossCursor );
00968                                 setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
00969                                 break;
00970                         default:
00971                                 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
00972                                 break;
00973                 }
00974                 myMode = mode;
00975         }
00976 }
00977 
00981 Standard_Real QoccViewWidget::precision( Standard_Real aReal )
00982 {
00983         Standard_Real preciseReal;
00984         Standard_Real thePrecision = std::max (myPrecision, viewPrecision());
00985         
00986         if ( myPrecision != 0.0 )
00987         {
00988                 preciseReal =  SIGN(aReal) * floor((std::abs(aReal) + thePrecision * 0.5) / thePrecision) * thePrecision;
00989         }
00990         else
00991         {
00992                 preciseReal = aReal;
00993         }
00994         return preciseReal;
00995 }
00996 
01008 Standard_Boolean QoccViewWidget::convertToPlane(const Standard_Integer Xs,
01009                                                                                              const Standard_Integer Ys,
01010                                                                                                  Standard_Real& X,
01011                                                                                                  Standard_Real& Y,
01012                                                                                                  Standard_Real& Z)
01013 {
01014         Standard_Real Xv, Yv, Zv;
01015         Standard_Real Vx, Vy, Vz;
01016         gp_Pln aPlane(myView->Viewer()->PrivilegedPlane());
01017 
01018 #ifdef OCC_PATCHED
01019         myView->Convert( Xs, Ys, Xv, Yv, Zv ); 
01020 #else
01021         // The + 1 overcomes a fault in OCC, in "OpenGl_togl_unproject_raster.c",
01022         // which transforms the Y axis ordinate. The function uses the height of the
01023         // window, not the Y maximum which is (height - 1).
01024         myView->Convert( Xs, Ys + 1, Xv, Yv, Zv ); 
01025 #endif 
01026 
01027         myView->Proj( Vx, Vy, Vz );
01028         gp_Lin aLine(gp_Pnt(Xv, Yv, Zv), gp_Dir(Vx, Vy, Vz));
01029         IntAna_IntConicQuad theIntersection( aLine, aPlane, Precision::Angular() );
01030         if (theIntersection.IsDone())
01031         {
01032                 if (!theIntersection.IsParallel())
01033                 {
01034                         if (theIntersection.NbPoints() > 0)
01035                         {
01036                                 gp_Pnt theSolution(theIntersection.Point(1));
01037                                 X = theSolution.X();
01038                                 Y = theSolution.Y();
01039                                 Z = theSolution.Z();
01040                                 return Standard_True;
01041                         }
01042                 }
01043         }
01044         return Standard_False;
01045 }
01053 void QoccViewWidget::drawRubberBand( const QPoint origin, const QPoint position )
01054 {
01055         if ( myRubberBand )
01056         {
01057                 redraw();
01058                 hideRubberBand();
01059                 myRubberBand->setGeometry( QRect( origin, position ).normalized() );
01060                 showRubberBand();
01061         }
01062 }
01066 void QoccViewWidget::showRubberBand( void )
01067 {
01068         if ( myRubberBand )
01069         {
01070                 myRubberBand->show();
01071         }
01072 }
01076 void QoccViewWidget::hideRubberBand( void )
01077 {
01078         if ( myRubberBand )
01079         {
01080                 myRubberBand->hide();
01081         }
01082 }
01086 int QoccViewWidget::paintCallBack (Aspect_Drawable /* drawable */, 
01087                                   void* aPointer,
01088                                   Aspect_GraphicCallbackStruct* /* data */)
01089 {
01090   QoccViewWidget *aWidget = (QoccViewWidget *) aPointer;
01091   aWidget->paintOCC();
01092   return 0;
01093 }
01094 
01098 void QoccViewWidget::paintOCC( void )
01099 {
01100         glDisable( GL_LIGHTING ); 
01101         glMatrixMode( GL_MODELVIEW );
01102         glPushMatrix();
01103         glLoadIdentity();
01104     glMatrixMode( GL_PROJECTION );
01105         glPushMatrix();
01106     glLoadIdentity();
01107 
01108         GLfloat left   = -1.0f;
01109         GLfloat right  =  1.0f;
01110         GLfloat bottom = -1.0f;
01111         GLfloat top    =  1.0f;
01112         GLfloat depth  =  1.0f;
01113 
01114     glOrtho( left, right, bottom, top, 1.0, -1.0 );
01115 
01116 #ifndef OCC_PATCHED
01117         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01118         if (myView->ColorScaleIsDisplayed())
01119         {
01120                 // Not needed on patched OCC 6.2 versions, but is the lowest
01121                 // common denominator working code on collaborators OpenGL
01122                 // graphics cards.
01123                 glBlendFunc(GL_ONE, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR);
01124         }
01125 #endif
01126 
01127     glBegin( GL_QUADS);
01128     {
01129       glColor4f  (  0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f, 1.0f );
01130       glVertex3d (  left, bottom, depth );
01131       glVertex3d ( right, bottom, depth );
01132       glColor4f  (  0.8f, 0.8f, 0.9f, 1.0f );
01133       glVertex3d ( right,    top, depth );
01134       glVertex3d (  left,    top, depth );
01135     }
01136     glEnd();
01137 
01138         glPopMatrix();
01139         glMatrixMode( GL_MODELVIEW );
01140         glPopMatrix();
01141 
01142 }
01150 Standard_Real QoccViewWidget::viewPrecision( bool resized )
01151 {
01152 
01153         Standard_Real X1, Y1, Z1;
01154         Standard_Real X2, Y2, Z2;
01155 
01156         if (resized || myViewPrecision == 0.0)
01157         {
01158                 myView->Convert( 0, 0, X1, Y1, Z1 ); 
01159                 myView->Convert( 1, 0, X2, Y2, Z2 ); 
01160                 Standard_Real pixWidth = X2 - X1;
01161                 if ( pixWidth != 0.0 )
01162                 {
01163                         // Return the precision as the next highest decade above the pixel width
01164                         myViewPrecision = std::pow (10.0, std::floor(std::log10( pixWidth ) + 1.0));
01165                 }
01166                 else
01167                 {
01168                         // Return the user precision if window not defined
01169                         myViewPrecision = myPrecision; 
01170                 }
01171         }
01172         return myViewPrecision;
01173 }
01174 
01175 void QoccViewWidget::slotSelectionChange() {
01176         myContext->Select();
01177 }
